pyral documentation!¶

Rally REST toolkit for Python¶

The official name for this software is Rally REST toolkit for Python.

The actual name of the package installed is pyral.

Contents:

  • Python toolkit for the Rally REST API
  • Simple Use
  • Rally Data Model
  • Rally Entities and Artifacts
  • Full CRUD capability
  • Rally Introspection
  • Queries and Results
  • Primary pyral classes and functions
  • rallySettings
  • Rally
    • Core REST methods and CRUD aliases
    • pyral.Rally instance convenience methods
  • RallyRESTResponse
  • Item Attributes
